name: ANT-AND-YEDDIM WISDOM
description: The Lunar may claim the shape of creatures with the tiny creature or legendary size qualities, granting her a success bonus to all relevant actions equal to her Essence.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.effect: Gain success bonus to appropriate actions (e.g., sneaking when tiny, smashing when giant) equal to Essence.

name: CHIMERA-SOUL EXPRESSION
description: The Lunar becomes a chimera, fusing two or more animals in her spirit shape. This Charm is permanent.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: New Type
modes.effect: Choose a different animal type and gain that type’s benefits.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Family Tree
modes.effect: If combining similar animals, add two dice to animal type’s benefit when appropriate.

name: CHANGING PHASES TRANSFORMATION
description: Commit 1 mote to redistribute your character’s Attributes for the scene; one Attribute is treated as 1 higher (max 5) for Excellencies.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.effect: Redistribute Attributes temporarily and boost one for Excellency usage.

name: HYBRID BODY TRANSFORMATION
description: The Lunar becomes a beastfolk-like creature, gaining dice bonuses and special abilities tied to her spirit shape.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Deadly Beast Transformation
modes.effect: Unarmed attacks are heavy weapons, Hardness and base Soak +1, 3 bonus dice to feats of strength, -1 Defense.

name: MANY-FACED MOON TRANSFORMATION
description: Spend 1 mote to subtly alter the appearance of your current shape (height, attributes, etc.). Changes persist until altered again.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.effect: Subtle shape changes — appearance, body type, sexual characteristics, etc.

name: MANIFOLD HUNTER’S TACTICS
description: Gain additional methods from Lunar Advantages to learn new shapes.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Argent Trickster’s Rook
modes.effect: Win shape in contest with wager.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Debt of Borrowed Skin
modes.effect: Collect shape as debt if debtor consents.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Face-Taker’s Gaze
modes.effect: Learn shape through shared Major Intimacy.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Heart-Drinking Allure
modes.effect: Copy shape from one who loves or lusts, via an intimate act.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Hero’s Heart Challenge
modes.effect: Defeat target and gain respect-based Major Intimacy.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Nest-Raiding Slyness
modes.effect: Infiltrate a target’s home and leave a mark.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Whispering Heart Revelation
modes.effect: Learn target’s deepest secret and keep shape even if secret is revealed.

name: MOUNTAINOUS SPIRIT EXPRESSION
description: Commit 1 mote to make a shape enormous. At Essence 2, it may grow to legendary size. At Essence 3, this may apply to the Lunar herself.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Essence 2 Upgrade
modes.effect: Form can grow to legendary size.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Essence 3 Repurchase
modes.effect: Apply the size effect to self.

name: CUNNING ANGLERFISH DECOY
description: Create harmless duplicates of the Lunar. Spend more motes for additional decoys. Initial creation grants a free outmaneuver Build Power roll.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Shedding the Spirit’s Skin
modes.effect: Duplicates may assume other known forms.

name: HUNGRY ALL-CONSUMING CLOUD
description: Lunar becomes a swarm, gaining Health, AOE light attacks, and rush advantage.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Wasp-and-Locust Legion
modes.effect: Transform into battle group with Finesse + War dice pool, Drill = Essence.

name: HUNTER-BAFFLING QUARRY’S CURSE
description: Marks a target with a fake Tell, making them appear to be the Lunar. Target suffers disguise penalties.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Lasting Brand
modes.effect: Duration increased to days with committed mote.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: False Moonrise Phantasm
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote to displace anima increase to marked target.

name: LAUGHING DEVIL DISTRACTION
description: The Lunar cajoles and teases her target, driving them to rage and distraction. When the Lunar uses the distract gambit, extend its duration to her Essence in rounds. She also gains one bonus success to any inspire or rally Build Power action when she Stunts using provocation to empower her allies. If she grants 4 or more Power while benefiting from this Charm, gain 1 anima.

name: LIVING HIVE TRANSFORMATION
description: The Lunar’s body begins to molt and change as her body partially transforms into a swarm of small animals. Commit 2 motes for the scene. Expend 1 anima on Step 8 to make a decisive counterattack with an unarmed strike or a natural weapon. She discounts the cost of the decisive attack by her Essence. She may also make counterattacks against any grapple techniques her enemy uses while in a clinch. Lunars may reflexively activate Living Hive Transformation when they activate Hybrid Body Transformation.

name: PREDATOR-AND-PREY MIRROR
description: The Lunar hides her own nature behind a mask, tricking others into playing their role in nature’s bloody game. Commit 1 mote and choose a mode. For the duration of the scene, or until you uncommit the mote, you may leverage the impression the mode grants your character as if it were a Minor Intimacy.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Predator
modes.effect: The Lunar presents herself as a natural predator for whoever she speaks to — to a corrupt bureaucrat, she might seem like an auditor; to a humble farmer, a bandit.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Prey
modes.effect: The Lunar presents herself as vulnerable, easy prey. Anyone not familiar with her capabilities will assume she’s an easy mark until she proves otherwise.

name: QUICKSILVER SECOND FACE
description: The Lunar’s form is as mutable as water, flowing instantly to fit whatever shape she desires. Shifting into the Lunar’s spirit shape no longer has a mote cost. Assuming a form that the Lunar has already shifted into previously this scene also no longer costs a mote.

name: SHADOW TALON EXECUTION
description: With the merest cover, the Lunar vanishes from her target’s sight and reappears in a brutal flash. Spend 1 mote on Step 1 while benefitting from Stealth-created concealment. Treat the target as though they had been ambushed regardless of if the action is taken after the first round. Charms or other powers that negate surprise negate this effect.

name: BEAST-SOUL AWAKENING
description: The Lunar crafts a sacred place that postulants may test themselves against, to be rewarded with Luna’s grace. The Lunar engages in a venture involving transforming a location into a sacred testing ground. Mortals who complete the trial are transformed into beastfolk with special abilities. This project has two base obstacles and may have more up to the Lunar’s Essence. Extra obstacles allow additional traits for transformed characters. Those who pass gain the benefits of Sharing Luna’s Gifts.

name: BOUNDARY-MARKING MEDITATION
description: The Lunar claims a region of land and defines three environmental qualities (e.g., overgrown, labyrinthine, dark). Actions fitting those traits gain 1 automatic success. Opposing actions take a -2 dice penalty. The Lunar may revoke this benefit for individuals. Once per major milestone, the Lunar may change the qualities. Gain 1 anima when this Charm’s effects penalize or benefit a character.

name: BUTTERFLY EYES MIRAGE
description: Commit 1 mote when making eye contact and make an instill roll. If successful, name one thing the target cannot notice as long as the Lunar interacts with them. Used in combat reflexively. Concealing another character creates successful concealment. When concealing hazards, the target notices just in time. If the concealed object relates to a Major Intimacy, the target may resist with a hard bargain.

name: GRASPING PSEUDOPOD METHOD
description: Commit 1 mote for the duration of a grapple. The Lunar may flurry miscellaneous actions during a grapple with no dice penalty. She may use gambits but not other attacks. Outside of combat, can be used to restrain targets while multitasking, including using social influence.

name: INSIDIOUS LUNAR TRANSFORMATION
prerequisites: Force 4 or Fortitude 4, Sharing Luna’s Gifts
description: Commit 1 mote and roll against the target. Transform the target into any animal or human form the Lunar possesses. Lasts for one + successes in downtime days or until session end. The Lunar can cancel earlier. Can be countered by Charm-based curse removals.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Witch-Among-Swine Spite
modes.effect: May use the Charm without sharing blood, provided the Lunar has a negative Major Intimacy toward the target.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Devourer of Form
modes.effect: May use the Charm without cost and regardless of distance after successfully completing a sacred hunt on the target.

name: RELENTLESS LUNAR FURY
description: Once wounded, the Lunar enters a berserk rage and draws power from her unending anger. Commit 1 mote on Step 7. For the rest of the scene, the Lunar reduces all wound penalties or other penalties from pain by one to a minimum of zero. On Step 5 of a decisive attack targeting her, she may spend 1 mote per damage die the enemy has in their pool, which grants the Lunar 1 Power per mote, as she empowers herself with rage. If this would cause her to exceed 10 Power, rather than donate it to allies or convert into anima, she may bank the extra Power as bonus damage successes on her next decisive attack against the target.

name: SHATTERED YOKE FURY
description: The Lunar’s presence is corrosive to hierarchy, authority, and decorum, giving voice to the oppressed. Whenever a character makes a hard bargain in the Lunar’s presence, that character gains an additional option: she may form a Major Intimacy of rage toward the character attempting to influence them as though an instill action were successful. Characters who choose this option must immediately act to express their anger, as if they were successfully influenced with persuade. Gain 1 anima.

name: SPIDER-AMID-ROSES DISCERNMENT
description: To the Lunar’s keen nose, toxins are as obvious as cloying perfume. Whenever the Lunar observes or handles a poisoned object (including food) or interacts with a diseased character, if the poison or disease has not been concealed with magic (such as a Charm) she automatically recognizes its toxic scent. If it has been concealed by a magical effect, the Lunar gains double 8s on any roll to identify it or discern its nature.

name: KRAKEN-ARM LASH
description: See p. 263
